channel.title: Triticum durum on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Triticum durum on funPlantGenes

item.title: TdDRF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TdDRF1 Gene Name: dehydration responsive factor 1 Genome: Species: Triticum durum Functional Descriptions: B genome specific polymorphism in the TdDRF1 gene is in relationship with grain yield.

item.title: TdPR61
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TdPR61 Gene Name: Triticum durum cultivar Langdon PR61 Genome: Species: Triticum durum Functional Descriptions: Characterization of the wheat gene encoding a grain-specific lipid transfer protein TdPR61, and promoter activity in wheat, barley and rice.
